div.p: Code System for QICore Adverse Event Type Codes (Preferred)
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/CodeSystem/qicore-adverseevent-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: A safety incident, reaction, medication error, or other untoward medical event affecting a patient
A safety event that almost happened, but was noticed and prevented in time to prevent harm from occurring to the patient
Any unsafe condition that poses a elevated risk to patient safety
